test_cases.test_name: Application Installation Verification on Qualified Server
test_cases.objective: Verify that the custom application installs successfully on the qualified production server in accordance with vendor instructions and URS requirements.

test_steps.action: Launch the installation package using administrator privileges as per SOP-APP-INS-001.
test_steps.expected_result: Installer starts and displays welcome screen without error.

test_steps.action: Follow documented installation steps selecting default validated configuration.
test_steps.expected_result: Installation completes with success message and exit code 0.

test_steps.action: Verify generated application files and directories match release manifest SHA256 checksums.
test_steps.expected_result: All installed files checksum match manifest; no discrepancies.

test_cases.test_name: Verification of Third-Party Dependency Installation
test_cases.objective: Confirm that all declared third-party frameworks, libraries, and runtime environments install correctly and are at the validated versions required by the custom application.

test_steps.action: Execute dependency installer script and capture console output to secure log.
test_steps.expected_result: Script executes without fatal errors and lists all components to be installed.

test_steps.action: Compare installed component versions to validated BOM provided in release documentation.
test_steps.expected_result: All component versions match BOM exactly.

test_steps.action: Review system event logs for warnings or errors related to dependency installation.
test_steps.expected_result: No critical warnings or errors present.

test_cases.test_name: Environment Variable and Configuration File Validation
test_cases.objective: Ensure all required environment variables and configuration files are correctly created, secured, and point to qualified resources.
prerequisites: Successful completion of OQ-001 and OQ-002

test_steps.action: Run configuration verification utility provided with release package.
test_steps.expected_result: Utility reports all required variables are present and correctly valued.

test_steps.action: Open configuration files and confirm read-only permissions for application service account.
test_steps.expected_result: Permissions set to read-only; no write access beyond administrators.

test_steps.action: Attempt to start application service and observe system log entries.
test_steps.expected_result: Service starts without configuration errors.

test_cases.test_name: Database Schema Creation and Version Control Verification
test_cases.objective: Validate that the database schema is created with correct structure, constraints, and version control tags as defined in the data definition scripts.

test_steps.action: Execute database creation script under controlled account and capture output.
test_steps.expected_result: Script completes without error and creates all objects.

test_steps.action: Run schema comparison tool against reference model to identify differences.
test_steps.expected_result: No differences detected between created schema and reference.

test_steps.action: Query version control table to confirm correct schema version inserted.
test_steps.expected_result: Version table shows expected version number and checksum.

test_cases.test_name: Verification of Configurable Parameters for Business Logic
test_cases.objective: Confirm that all configurable parameters governing business logic are set to validated default values and protected from unauthorized change.

test_steps.action: Log in as configuration administrator and export parameter set.
test_steps.expected_result: Export completes and creates checksum-protected file.

test_steps.action: Compare exported parameters to validated baseline defined in release notes.
test_steps.expected_result: All parameters match validated baseline exactly.

test_steps.action: Attempt to modify critical parameter as standard user.
test_steps.expected_result: System prevents change and records audit trail entry.

test_cases.test_name: Functional Execution of Custom Business Rule for OOS Investigation
test_cases.objective: Validate that the custom scripted business rule for Out-Of-Specification (OOS) investigations triggers correctly and performs expected calculations.

test_steps.action: Enter test result exceeding specification limit into LIMS sample worksheet.
test_steps.expected_result: System triggers OOS business rule automatically.

test_steps.action: Review generated investigation record and verify pre-populated fields.
test_steps.expected_result: Investigation contains correct sample ID and result value.

test_steps.action: Approve investigation as QA and confirm status updates correctly.
test_steps.expected_result: Status changes to 'Approved' and audit trail entry recorded.

test_cases.test_name: Verification of Sample Login Attribute Calculations
test_cases.objective: Ensure that calculated sample attributes such as expiry date and storage conditions are derived accurately during sample login.

test_steps.action: Log a new sample with known manufacture date and product master data.
test_steps.expected_result: System displays calculated expiry date automatically.

test_steps.action: Select specific storage condition from dropdown and save record.
test_steps.expected_result: Saved record shows correct storage condition code.

test_steps.action: Query database to verify stored values match displayed values.
test_steps.expected_result: Database fields contain identical values to UI.

test_cases.test_name: Functional Verification of Stability Study Protocol Configuration
test_cases.objective: Validate that stability study protocols are generated correctly using configured templates and user inputs.

test_steps.action: Create new stability study using pre-configured template.
test_steps.expected_result: System loads template with default intervals and pull points.

test_steps.action: Modify one interval and save protocol.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol saves without error and reflects modified interval.

test_steps.action: Generate protocol report and verify content against saved data.
test_steps.expected_result: Report data matches protocol record exactly.

test_cases.test_name: Functional Test of SAP ERP Interface Transactions
test_cases.objective: Confirm that sample registration and result posting transactions are exchanged accurately between LIMS and SAP using the standard adapter.

test_steps.action: Register test sample in LIMS and trigger automatic push to SAP.
test_steps.expected_result: Transaction ID created and visible in SAP inbound queue.

test_steps.action: Post analytical result in LIMS and trigger update to SAP.
test_steps.expected_result: SAP displays updated QC status without errors.

test_steps.action: Review interface log for warnings or errors.
test_steps.expected_result: No interface errors recorded; status "SUCCESS".

test_cases.test_name: Verification of Electronic Worksheets for Analytical Methods
test_cases.objective: Ensure that electronic worksheets for all configured analytical methods calculate results and enforce limits correctly.

test_steps.action: Open worksheet template for HPLC method and enter calibration data.
test_steps.expected_result: System calculates calibration curve with correct R² value.

test_steps.action: Enter sample absorbance readings and save worksheet.
test_steps.expected_result: System calculates concentration and flags any OOS values.

test_steps.action: Review audit trail for worksheet creation and modification events.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit trail entries are complete, timestamped, and attributable.

test_cases.test_name: Performance Test for 100 Concurrent User Sessions
test_cases.objective: Evaluate system response time and stability when 100 concurrent users perform routine operations.

test_steps.action: Initiate load test with 100 virtual users logging samples and querying results.
test_steps.expected_result: Average response time remains below 2 seconds.

test_steps.action: Monitor server CPU, memory, and I/O utilization during test.
test_steps.expected_result: Utilization stays below 75% thresholds.

test_steps.action: Review application logs for errors or dropped connections.
test_steps.expected_result: No errors or dropped sessions detected.

test_cases.test_name: Throughput Test for High Volume Sample Processing
test_cases.objective: Validate that the system can process 10,000 sample results in under one hour without data loss or corruption.

test_steps.action: Start automated script to import 10,000 sample result records.
test_steps.expected_result: Import process starts and displays progress without error.

test_steps.action: Measure total processing time upon completion.
test_steps.expected_result: Processing completes within 60 minutes.

test_steps.action: Run reconciliation report to verify record counts.
test_steps.expected_result: All 10,000 records present and reconciled; zero rejects.

test_cases.test_name: Algorithm Accuracy Verification for Result Calculations
test_cases.objective: Verify mathematical accuracy of critical algorithms by comparing computed results to independently calculated reference values.

test_steps.action: Load reference dataset containing 500 known calculation scenarios.
test_steps.expected_result: Dataset loads without error.

test_steps.action: Execute application calculations and export results.
test_steps.expected_result: Export completes and contains 500 result lines.

test_steps.action: Compare exported results to reference values using statistical tool.
test_steps.expected_result: All results match within ±0.1% tolerance.

test_cases.test_name: Database Query Performance Under Peak Load
test_cases.objective: Assess response time of complex queries during simultaneous peak user activity to ensure acceptable performance.

test_steps.action: Execute predefined complex report query every 30 seconds during peak load.
test_steps.expected_result: Each query returns within 5 seconds.

test_steps.action: Monitor database wait statistics and index usage.
test_steps.expected_result: No index contention or long waits observed.

test_steps.action: Review database logs for deadlocks or timeouts.
test_steps.expected_result: No deadlocks or timeouts recorded.

test_cases.test_name: Stress Test at Maximum System Capacity
test_cases.objective: Determine system behavior when pushed to defined maximum capacity to ensure graceful degradation without data loss.

test_steps.action: Simulate 200% of expected peak workload for 2 hours.
test_steps.expected_result: System remains online; response time does not exceed 5 seconds.

test_steps.action: Force additional workload until system reaches failure point.
test_steps.expected_result: System throttles requests and logs controlled error messages.

test_steps.action: Verify no data corruption by running integrity check after test.
test_steps.expected_result: Integrity check passes with zero errors.

test_cases.test_name: User Role Access Control Verification
test_cases.objective: Validate that access permissions for Analyst, Reviewer, and QA Approver roles function as configured and prevent unauthorized actions.

test_steps.action: Log in as Analyst and attempt to approve result.
test_steps.expected_result: System denies approval and displays permission error.

test_steps.action: Log in as Reviewer and perform result review.
test_steps.expected_result: Reviewer can review but cannot final approve.

test_steps.action: Log in as QA Approver and finalize approval.
test_steps.expected_result: Approval succeeds and audit trail entry records role.

test_cases.test_name: Electronic Signature and Two-Stage Review Validation
test_cases.objective: Confirm that electronic signature collection meets 21 CFR Part 11 requirements and two-stage review workflow functions correctly.

test_steps.action: Submit record for review and enter first electronic signature as Reviewer.
test_steps.expected_result: System records signature with correct meaning and timestamp.

test_steps.action: Approve record as QA Approver with second signature.
test_steps.expected_result: System records second signature and changes status to Approved.

test_steps.action: Attempt to modify approved record without invalidating signatures.
test_steps.expected_result: System prevents modification or requires signature invalidation.

test_cases.test_name: Audit Trail Integrity and Completeness Verification
test_cases.objective: Ensure that audit trail captures all create, modify, and delete events with accurate timestamps and user attribution.

test_steps.action: Create, modify, and delete a test record sequentially.
test_steps.expected_result: Each action recorded in audit trail with distinct entry.

test_steps.action: Export audit trail and verify entries cannot be altered.
test_steps.expected_result: Exported file is read-only and checksum protected.

test_steps.action: Attempt to disable audit trail as non-admin user.
test_steps.expected_result: System prevents action and logs attempt.

test_cases.test_name: Application Penetration Testing for Vulnerability Detection
test_cases.objective: Identify and verify remediation of common web application vulnerabilities such as SQL injection, XSS, and CSRF.

test_steps.action: Run automated vulnerability scan against application endpoints.
test_steps.expected_result: No high or critical vulnerabilities detected.

test_steps.action: Manually test SQL injection on input fields using benign payloads.
test_steps.expected_result: System sanitizes input and returns safe error messages.

test_steps.action: Attempt cross-site scripting attack on comments field.
test_steps.expected_result: Script tags are neutralized and not executed.

test_cases.test_name: Session Timeout and Account Lockout Verification
test_cases.objective: Confirm that inactive sessions timeout and repeated failed logins lock accounts per security policy.

test_steps.action: Log in and remain inactive for defined timeout period.
test_steps.expected_result: Session terminates automatically upon timeout.

test_steps.action: Attempt five consecutive failed logins for same user.
test_steps.expected_result: Account locks and lockout recorded in audit trail.

test_steps.action: Unlock account as administrator and review audit logs.
test_steps.expected_result: Unlock recorded with admin user attribution.

test_cases.test_name: Timestamp Accuracy Verification Against Time Source
test_cases.objective: Ensure system timestamps are synchronized with approved NTP time source within ±2 seconds to maintain contemporaneous records.

test_steps.action: Query system time and compare to NTP source using approved utility.
test_steps.expected_result: Time difference less than 2 seconds.

test_steps.action: Create new record and note timestamp.
test_steps.expected_result: Timestamp matches system time within 1 second.

test_steps.action: Review audit trail entries for correct chronological order.
test_steps.expected_result: Entries appear in sequential order without gaps.

test_cases.test_name: Data Retention and Archival Functionality Test
test_cases.objective: Verify that data older than retention threshold is archived correctly and remains retrievable and readable for 7 years.

test_steps.action: Execute archival job for data older than threshold date.
test_steps.expected_result: Job completes successfully and creates archive package.

test_steps.action: Retrieve archived data and restore to test environment.
test_steps.expected_result: Data restores without error and maintains integrity checksums.

test_steps.action: Open restored records to confirm readability.
test_steps.expected_result: Records open and display correctly.

test_cases.test_name: Data Migration Accuracy from Legacy System
test_cases.objective: Validate that migrated legacy data is identical in value and context after import into new system.

test_steps.action: Import legacy dataset via migration utility.
test_steps.expected_result: Import completes with zero errors.

test_steps.action: Run post-migration reconciliation comparing record counts.
test_steps.expected_result: Counts match exactly between legacy and new system.

test_steps.action: Spot-check 20 records for field-by-field accuracy.
test_steps.expected_result: All checked records match source data.

test_cases.test_name: Audit Trail Tamper Evidence Verification
test_cases.objective: Confirm that any attempt to alter audit trail data is detected and prevented by tamper-evident controls.

test_steps.action: Attempt direct database update to audit trail table using SQL console.
test_steps.expected_result: Database rejects update due to encryption or trigger protection.

test_steps.action: Review application logs for tampering attempt.
test_steps.expected_result: System logs security event with high severity.

test_steps.action: Verify audit trail remains unchanged by comparing pre and post checksums.
test_steps.expected_result: Checksums identical; no change detected.

test_cases.test_name: Backup and Disaster Recovery Verification
test_cases.objective: Validate that system backup completes successfully and can be restored within defined RTO and RPO limits.

test_steps.action: Execute full system backup manually and note completion time.
test_steps.expected_result: Backup finishes without errors and within 30 minutes.

test_steps.action: Restore backup to recovery server and measure restore time.
test_steps.expected_result: Restore completes within 45 minutes.

test_steps.action: Perform functional smoke test on restored system.
test_steps.expected_result: All key functions operate correctly post-restore.

test_cases.test_name: Integration Test of EMS Temperature Data Import
test_cases.objective: Verify that temperature data exported from EMS is imported into the custom application database without data loss and with correct mapping.

test_steps.action: Trigger data import job with latest EMS export file.
test_steps.expected_result: Job completes with status SUCCESS.

test_steps.action: Compare imported data counts to EMS export counts.
test_steps.expected_result: Counts match exactly.

test_steps.action: Validate random set of 10 records for accurate field mapping.
test_steps.expected_result: Fields match EMS values precisely.

test_cases.test_name: End-to-End LIMS-SAP Adapter Integration Test
test_cases.objective: Confirm that configured SAP adapter handles complex transaction sets bi-directionally without error.

test_steps.action: Send batch of 50 sample registrations from SAP to LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: All 50 samples appear in LIMS inbox.

test_steps.action: Process samples in LIMS and transmit results back to SAP.
test_steps.expected_result: SAP updates batch status and QC results without error.

test_steps.action: Review adapter logs for retries or failures.
test_steps.expected_result: No retries or failures recorded.

test_cases.test_name: Analytical Instrument Interface Data Capture Test
test_cases.objective: Validate that raw data from analytical instruments is captured automatically and linked to correct sample records.

test_steps.action: Run instrument assay and generate raw data file.
test_steps.expected_result: Data file appears in instrument drop folder.

test_steps.action: Confirm auto-import service processes file.
test_steps.expected_result: Service log shows successful import event.

test_steps.action: Open sample record to verify raw data attachment.
test_steps.expected_result: Attachment linked and viewable from sample record.

test_cases.test_name: Reporting Engine Template Integration Verification
test_cases.objective: Ensure that configured reporting templates generate accurate PDF reports including electronic signatures and audit trail summaries.

test_steps.action: Generate batch release report for test batch.
test_steps.expected_result: Report generates without error and saves to secure repository.

test_steps.action: Open report and verify data fields and signature blocks.
test_steps.expected_result: Data correct and signature blocks display Reviewer and QA names.

test_steps.action: Validate report PDF hash matches stored hash in database.
test_steps.expected_result: Hashes match, confirming integrity.

test_cases.test_name: End-to-End Sample Lifecycle User Acceptance Scenario
test_cases.objective: Demonstrate that a sample can be logged, tested, reviewed, approved, reported, and archived without deviation across integrated subsystems.

test_steps.action: Log sample in LIMS, capture instrument data, and process analysis.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample progresses to review status with attached data.

test_steps.action: Perform two-stage review and approval, then generate final report.
test_steps.expected_result: Report generated and sample status set to Closed.

test_steps.action: Archive sample record per retention policy.
test_steps.expected_result: Record archived and retrievable in read-only mode.
